skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Building interactive, responsive, and visually appealing web interfaces using React.js, Next.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Material UI, and Redux.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Developing efficient server-side applications, REST APIs, and authentication systems with Node.js, Express.js, Firebase, JWT, and OAuth.

skills.title: Database & Cloud Services
skills.description: Implementing secure and scalable databases with cloud integration for optimized data handling using MongoDB, SQL, Firebase, AWS S3, EC2, SNS, and Elastic Beanstalk.

skills.title: Version Control & Deployment
skills.description: Using Git, GitHub, and AWS for managing source code, team collaboration, and cloud deployment for efficient and streamlined development workflows.

portfolio.title: Easy Job
portfolio.description: A job listing platform with secure authentication, role-based access, and real-time updates using MongoDB, Node.js, and AWS S3 for optimized data handling.

portfolio.title: Role-Based Authentication System
portfolio.description: Implemented secure user access control with JWT, Auth, and RBAC, ensuring restricted permissions for different user roles in a full-stack web application.

portfolio.title: Loan Management App
portfolio.description: A financial platform enabling secure login, loan tracking, and transaction management with real-time updates using Node.js, Express.js, Firebase

testimonial.description: Easy Job App made our hiring process efficient with its intuitive job listings and role-based access. Itâ€™s a well-structured and scalable solution that simplifies recruitment workflows.
The Loan Management App provided a seamless way to track loans with secure authentication . It features an intuitive dashboard for users to monitor their loan status efficiently
The Role-Based Authentication System ensured secure access control with dynamic permissions. Its JWT and OAuth integration made authentication smooth and highly secure.
